message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm asking for $16,000 to start.  What do you think?
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but this product is very valuable to me. How about we settle at $13,000?
I'm starting to think that this product is worth a lot to me, but I still think $13,000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to meet you in the middle again, at $11,000. Can we agree on that price?
